content.rendered:
We are proud to congratulate the following staff members who were recognized at the Tenure Recognition Reception on June 12, 2025. 

Caroline Street: Megan Moroukian

Division Street: Kelly DiBella

Dorothy Nolan: Nicole Usher and Kelly Leabourne

Geyser Road: Kala Boudreau

Greenfield: Maryellen Annese, Meaghan Hmura, Kristine Snow, and Dana Kiefer

Lake Avenue: Stephanie Cash, Giselle Hunter, Christine O’Riordan and Lenora Carr

Maple Avenue: Caitlin Clancy, Kennedy Cocozzo, Jennifer Mead, Briana Rein, Micaela Vanderzyden, and Sandra Fecura

High School: Alexandria Blanchard, Kevin Colella, Tyler Comito, and Carly Dellis

Administration: Cody Conley, Mary Alice Hipwell, Bethany Nightingale, and Michele Whitley
